body:
Hi Shrikar! Remember me?

I would also check with Kevin Van Den Wymelenberg at the University of
Idaho. He did his masters thesis on creating a regional lighting lab.

On 6/27/2013 11:52 AM, radiance-general-request at radiance-online.org wrote:

--

*Jill Dalglish, PE, LEED AP BD+C*

S/W/DBE Certified Business
_www.dalglishdaylighting.com_ <http://www.dalglishdaylighting.com/>
303-955-4945
